name: Santa Def
description:
Defend your christmas presents by adding turrets, ramparts and shooting on the enemies.

Controls :

----------------------

1 2 3 4 5 to change Weapon

AD to move

W to jump

Left click of the mouse to shoot

Right click of the mouse to dash

-----------------------

You can change the input the option !

Credits

-------------

music by Demonicity : http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/723634

-------------

Enjoy !
